title: Unknown error has occurred
body: I just logged on after school and i put all my info in to login and it logs me in but also says unknown error has occurred. I have no clue what to do. I looked up the problem (not a great amount) but i didn't really see much on fixing it.

replies.body: This may have been a result of a server issue that occurred during this period, but everything should be fine now.  Make sure to bookmark our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) to stay up to date on any issues.  Thanks for the report!
